text: Kanye West shocked fans when he publicly shared longterm friend John Legend's private text messages on Twitter. But within minutes on Thursday morning, Kim Kardashian was attempting to defuse the situation, with the help of her BFF Chrissy Teigen, aka Mrs John Legend. The two swiftly put a jokey spin on Kanye's decision to share John's personal message, in which he firmly but kindly rebuked Kanye for his support of Donald Trump.
